topic.title: Why do I get "access denied" for the runtimePermission createSecurityManager?

section.p: You need to install the file jsk-policy-2.1.jar into the JRE's extension folder. The jsk-policy-2.1.jar file can be found in the lib-ext directory of your bundle. On Windows, this install location is in \lib\ext sub-directory of the JRE's extension folder. For example :
section.note: Copy the file from the bundle to the JRE's extension folder. If there is already a file in this location, make a backup first, since there may be another application installed on the machine which is dependent on its settings.
